name: Star Blaster
description:
Fight for your right to survive in STAR BLASTER!

The classic action arcade space shooter that's bound to keep you on the edge of your seat as you try to survive Unidentified UFO Objects and Strobing Stars!

"Believe you can and you're halfway there."

9/10, Theodore Roosevelt, IGN

"A day without sunshine is like, you know, night."

7/7, Steve Martin, GameSpot

"Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going."

89, Sam Levenson, Metacritic

This game is somewhat IN DEVELOPMENT, so it is NOT finished!

MADE IN TIC-80 

Up/Down/Left/Right - Steer ship

Z - Shoot

X - Start/Pause
